DOC.brief_title: Improving Reproductive Fitness Through Pretreatment With Lifestyle Modification Obese Women With Unexplained Infertility
DOC.detailed_description: Study Objective An intensive lifestyle modification intervention ( include caloric restriction , use over-the-counter weight loss medication , moderate physical activity track ) design promote weight loss approximately 7 % initial body weight likely achieve good perinatal outcome ( i.e . healthy term normal weight infant ) recommendation standard lifestyle modification moderate physical activity tracking ( base publically available activity recommendation ) obese woman unexplained infertility . Patient Population The population consist 380 obese woman unexplained infertility , age 18-40 year old . Subjects must normal ovulatory function normal ovarian reserve . Additionally , couple major infertility factor : subject least one patent fallopian tube normal uterine cavity , partner total motile sperm count least 5 million least one ejaculate . Study Design This two-arm , multicenter , prospective , randomized clinical trial lifestyle modification program track increased physical activity weight loss ( intensive ) compare recommendation track increased physical activity alone weight maintenance ( standard ) woman obesity unexplained infertility . This 16 week period lifestyle modification follow open label empiric infertility treatment regimen consist three cycle ovarian stimulation oral medication ( clomiphene citrate ( CC ) ) , trigger ovulation human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) . Treatment The intensive lifestyle modification intervention consist caloric restriction ( consumption approximately 1200-1500 kcal/d ) , use over-the-counter weight loss medication ( Alli , brand name Orlistat , gastric lipase inhibitor limit gut fat absorption ) , moderate physical activity ( goal reach 10,000 step day ) . The pretreatment intervention last 16 week design promote weight loss approximately 7 % total body weight . Women standard lifestyle intervention ( standard ) receive publicly available write material promote engagement moderate physical activity target 10,000 step day . Detailed instruction physical activity provide . Participants group receive activity track device ( Fitbit Wireless Activity Tracker ) wireless scale ( Fitbit Aria Wireless Activity Scale ) promote adherence invention allow monitor compliance study personnel . The pretreatment intervention last 16 week . Both group aim activity level 10,000 steps/day , recommendation increase step baseline 500 steps/per week . The investigator monitor subject monthly preconception intervention . After 16 week lifestyle modification , subject randomize receive standardize empiric infertility treatment , regardless adherence success achieve treatment goal . This treatment consist ovarian stimulation CC follow ultrasound follicular monitoring , hCG trigger ovulation , single partner intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) per treatment cycle three treatment cycle . The goal treatment group maintain level physical activity weight achieve pretreatment phase empiric infertility treatment phase . Subjects conceive follow throughout pregnancy wireless activity monitor wireless scale . Additionally three brief onsite visit pregnancy ( per trimester 16 , 24 , 32 week ) onsite determination weight , glycemic , blood pressure change collection biospecimens . All pregnancy outcomes track . Subjects deliver encourage donate placenta cord blood study repository enroll Pregnancy Registry continue infant follow-up . The investigator also expand number variety specimen collect repository partner include urine serum , semen , saliva , placenta cord blood .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women ≥18 ≤ 40 year age , one year infertility history , desirous conceiving , regularly ovulate ( define 9 menses per year ) , initiation participation . 2 . BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2 . 3 . Normal uterine cavity least one open fallopian tube confirm hysterosalpingography ( HSG ) , sonohysterography ( SHG ) , laparoscopy/hysteroscopy last three year precede enrollment study . An uncomplicated intrauterine nonIVF pregnancy uncomplicated delivery postpartum course result live birth within last three year also serve sufficient evidence patent tube normal uterine cavity long subject , pregnancy subsequently , risk factor Asherman 's syndrome serious pelvic infection disorder lead increase suspicion intrauterine abnormality tubal occlusion . 4 . Evidence ovarian function/reserve assess menstrual cycle day 3 ( +/2 day ) FSH ≤10 IU/L estradiol ≤ 70 pg/mL OR AMH ≥ 1 ng/mL within one year prior study initiation . 5 . Normal correct thyroid function within one year study initiation . 6 . Normal correct prolactin level within one year study initiation . 7 . In general good health , take medication could interfere study ( e.g. , FSH , insulin sensitizer ) . 8 . Ability insemination follow hCG administration . 9 . Male partner total motile sperm ejaculate least 5 million sperm , within one year study initiation . 10 . Able comply intercourse instruction collection semen insemination . 1 . Currently pregnant successful pregnancy within 12 month initiate participation . Clinical intrauterine miscarriage prior initiate participation , within ASRM guideline : subject 35 must wait six month , subject 35 must wait 12 month . No exclusion biochemical pregnancy . 2 . Undiagnosed abnormal uterine bleeding . 3 . Suspicious ovarian mass . 4 . Subjects oral contraceptive , depoprogestins , hormonal implant ( include Implanon ) . A two month washout period require prior screening patient agent . Longer washouts may necessary certain depot contraceptive method implant , especially implant still place . A onemonth washout require patient take oral cyclic progestin . 5 . Known 21hydroxylase deficiency enzyme defect cause congenital adrenal hyperplasia . 6 . Type I Type II diabetes mellitus , receive antidiabetic medication . 7 . Known significant anemia ( Hemoglobin < 10 g/dL ) . 8 . History deep venous thrombosis , pulmonary embolus , cerebrovascular event . 9 . Known heart disease ( New York Heart Association Class II high ) . 10 . Known Liver disease ( define AST ALT > 2 time normal , total bilirubin > 2.5 mg/dL ) . 11 . Known Renal disease ( define BUN > 30 mg/dL serum creatinine > 1.4 mg/dL ) . 12 . History , suspect cervical carcinoma , endometrial carcinoma breast carcinoma . 13 . History alcohol abuse ( define > 14 drinks/week ) binge drink ≥ 6 drink one time ) . 14 . Known Cushing 's disease . 15 . Known suspected adrenal ovarian androgen secrete tumor . 16 . Allergy contraindication treatment medication : CC hCG . 17 . Couples previous sterilization procedure ( e.g . vasectomy , tubal ligation ) whether reverse . 18 . Subjects untreated poorly control hypertension define systolic blood pressure ≥ 160 mm Hg diastolic ≥ 100 mm Hg obtain two measure least 60 minute apart . 19 . Subjects undergone bariatric surgery procedure past period acute weight loss ( defined weight loss great 5 kg last 6 month ) . 20 . Known moderate severe endometriosis . 21 . Anovulation oligoovulation include hypothalamic amenorrhea , polycystic ovary syndrome , etc . 22 . Donated semen . 23 . Couples either partner legally marry someone else . 24 . Medical condition contraindication pregnancy . 25 . Presence severe , untreated psychiatric illness ( major depression , substance abuse , eat disorder , etc . ) would , opinion site investigator , interfere patient 's ability successfully complete study . 26 . Any additional medical condition would contraindication orlistat . ( This include patient chronic malabsorption syndrome cholestasis know hypersensitivity drug use study . ) 27 . Any contraindication study requirement include diet recommendation activity requirement . 28 . Currently participate lifestyle intervention program ( Weight Watchers , Atkins Diet , Curves ) lose 5 % body weight within last 6 month . 29 . History Gout .
